name: TIME'S ART #1: DESCONFIE
description: "Distrust your thoughts". From 2015-2019 I created handmade stickers with phrases I repeated to myself like personal mantras and pasted them up in places I'd see on my daily commute. They were reminders I needed. For most of them, the passage of time meant their destruction or removal. But, for a few others, Time became another artistic element involved, giving them an even more unique aspect.
